body.name: Solo Stove Bonfire Fire Pit Handle Accessory Great Portable Camping Outdoor Fire Pit Tool for Carrying Camp Equipment Stoves and Backyard Fire Pits
features: PORTABLE: Moving your fire pit used to be a two-person job. You were both hunched over, waddling to find the perfect place to light your Bonfire.

SIMPLE DESIGN: Solo Stove Handle makes moving your Ranger quick and easy, using only one hand. Enjoy a smooth carry from backyard to backcountry and anywhere in between. Just dip, lift, and go. It’s that seamless.
LOCKS IN PLACE: Solo Stove Handle locks into place inside your Bonfire to take it wherever you want it to be.

ANGLED FOR EASY CARRY: Solo Stove Handle’s ingenious, angled design allows you to pick up and carry your Bonfire in a single, seamless motion using only one hand. Just lock the front-bumper rod into any secondary burn hole and lift.

BACK BUMPER: The back bumper will press against the inside wall of your fire pit firmly, but with enough flexibility to absorb motion as you walk. Solo Stove Handle can lock into place in any secondary burn hole, no matter which way you approach your fire pit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Move Anywhere Easily Solo Stove Bonfire Handle Move your Bonfire from backyard to backcountry with one fluid motion for simple and seamless transitions. Carrying your favorit fire pit has never been that effortless. Angled and oversized for the most comfortable and secure lift, Handle’s unique design offers ultimate accessibility for any fire caretaker. With Handle’s one-hand carry, your fire pit can be moved to and from your favorite spot..
Dimensions & Materials Height 6 in | 15 cm Length 18.75 in | 47.5 cm Weight 1.03 lbs | 0.5 kg Materials 304 Stainless Steel

Previous page Easy To Use Just lock the front-bumper rod into any secondary burn hole and lift. Long Lasting Constructed from 304 stainless steel, Handle is built to last as long as your fire pit. Portable With Handle’s one-hand carry, your fire pit can be moved to and from your favorite spot. Convenient Convenient Handle — Bring Your Bonfire to More Places. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much easier way to transport Solo Stove Bonfire
reviews.reviewText: I bought my Solo Stove Bonfire in 2022. My wife and I have LOVED sitting next to it in the evenings in the summer. One of the biggest complaints I had about it was that it was awkward to carry it across the yard to dump the ash out of them. Without a handle, you have to wrap your arms around it and carry it against your body, which results in ash coming out of the small holes along the bottom coming out and getting on your clothes.This handle makes it so much easier to carry. You just stick in one end, insert the other into one of the holes near the top and then lift it up. Now it can easily be carried with one hand to your dumping grounds.This is the most reasonably priced of the Solo Stove accessories too. I would recommend this to Solo Stove Bonfire users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bit expensive but perfect for my Solo Stove
reviews.reviewText: Solo stove should have made it simple by making this as a standard accessory that comes with the bonfire. I love my solo stove and from the get go I got a quality item. I got the first gen so the internal tray is not removeable so moving the bonfire from one place to another is sometimes a challenge since I have a knee and back issues. This handle helped me a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic Solo Stove Quality
reviews.reviewText: This little handle is really simple. There are no springs, motors, or sensors to wear out. Just a brilliantly designed, attractive, and well made accessory for the also-awesome Solo Stove. Does this stuff cost you? Yes but you are getting nicely made products that serve a useful purpose. Carrying around the stove with two hands kind of sucks. People ask why there's no handle on the stove itself? Well one hot smoldering fire, a five year old's hand and a searing third degree burn you cant even feel because it damages the nerve endings is all it takes for Solo to lose their rep and their increase their liability. So until someone invents a cool-touch handle this is the next best thing. I only hope Solo makes it a standard accessory included with their stoves in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handle is pretty handy
reviews.reviewText: Good for lifting the stove to dump the ashes in the dumpster. For sure makes it easier to move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great accessory. Just too $$$
reviews.reviewText: Great little accessory for your Solo stove. Easy to use and certainly helps when putting your stove in the carry case. However, like all Solo products, I believe it is overpriced for what you get…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This handle locks in place and will not let go until you are ready. It seems to be well made. I am a little skeptical of the tack welds holding it together but they are quality tacks. I have the bonfire and it is almost a necessity. It is awkward to carry. Overall a nice looking component and very useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient attachment for the Solo stove.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my friend with a Solo Stove. It fit perfectly and makes it easier to move around.
Great purchase, does what its supposed to do
Endlich keine schmutzigen Hände mehr, wenn man den Solostove umsetzt.Zwar ist der Preis normal recht happig, deshalb habe ich an Black Friday zugeschlagen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Enables you to carry your fire pit safely
reviews.reviewText: I got this after noticing how sharp some of the edges were on my Bonfire when I went to move it. It’s expensive, but if it prevents a visit to A&E then it was worth it, but I would argue it should be supplied with the Bonfire as standard (or at least a less robust “starter” version) in the first place.

reviews.reviewTitle: ボンファイヤーには絶対に必要
reviews.reviewText: 庭やデッキ等に置きっぱなしで移動を全くしない使い方なら別ですが、ボンファイヤーをこれ無しで移動させるのは非常に困難です。ボンファイヤーを横倒しにして転がしたり逆さまにして灰を出したりするだけなら素手でも可能ですが、少しの距離でも移動させるならハンドルは必須です。内側上部の二次燃焼用の穴を利用すれば工夫次第で道具を自作できそうな気もしますが、丈夫さや安全面を考えるとやはり専用のハンドルを購入すべきでしょう。高額になるのでメーカーとしては標準装備にはしていないのだとは思いますが、金額を考えなければ間違いなく標準装備にすべき道具です。使用方法はとても簡単で使いやすいです。
it is very useful when you need to move the fire pitI do recommend it
